short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that directly links a professor's ratemyprofessors.com page in McGill course websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that directly links a professor's ratemyprofessors.com page in McGill university course websites by turning professor names into clickable ratemyprofessors.com links. Increases convenience when browsing courses on the McGill course webpage by allowing users to easily and convenient access professor's ratings and reviews to help them make more informed course planning decisions.
